title: Chloe Sims cosies up to Pete Wicks during TOWIE Halloween filming
text:
She's enjoying a blossoming new romance with Pamela Anderson's ex Adil Rami.

But Chloe Sims only had eyes for her best friend and 'soul mate' Pete Wicks during filming for TOWIE's Halloween Special on Monday.

TOWIE favourite Chloe, 37, showed off her incredible physique in a low cut crop top teamed with dramatic makeup as she cuddled up to Pete ahead of filming.

Pals: Chloe Sims only had eyes for her best friend and 'soul mate' Pete Wicks during filming for TOWIE's Halloween Special on Monday

Chloe wowed in black thigh-high boots teamed with a leather jacket for the busy day on set.

She added a short peroxide blonde wig and really went to town with her makeup, showing off blood red lips and lashings of eyeliner surrounding her spooky contact lenses.

Pete meanwhile went for a low-key costume, accessorising his white t-shirt and plaid shirt combo with a few blood stains and gory makeup to make it look like he had a nasty head wound.

Chills: TOWIE favourite Chloe, 37, showed off her incredible physique in a low cut crop top and thigh-high boots teamed with dramatic makeup for filming

Spooky: Pete meanwhile went for a low-key costume, accessorising his white t-shirt and plaid shirt combo with a few blood stains and gory makeup

Chloe and Pete have been best friends through plenty of TOWIE drama, with the unlucky-in-love blonde admitting in a recent episode that the hunk is her soul mate.

During a catch-up with her sisters Frankie, 24, Demi, 23, and their nan, the eldest sibling of the Sims clan revealed she was set to see a regression specialist with Pete.

Admitting she believed they were 'soulmates in another life', the reality star said: 'I think me and Pete are soul mates, and that doesn't necessarily mean we need to be in a relationship. You get me all flustered talking about this.'

Sticking close: Chloe and Pete have been best friends through plenty of TOWIE drama, with the unlucky in love blonde admitting in a recent episode that the hunk is her soul mate

Eager to discover whether the pair once shared a deeper connection, Chloe asked the medium: 'We're really good friends, best friends, but people say we should get together. I just want to know whether we were together in a past life?'

The psychic told her: 'You both have commitment issues. If he got with you, he'd have to commit. I think you'd come together and separate but you'd always come back together. If you guys mature, you could stay together for good.'

But despite her growing closeness with Pete, Chloe revealed last week that she had a 'perfect' first date with Pamela Anderson's ex Adil Rami, 33.

BFFs: The pals looked in great spirits as they laughed together before the cameras rolled

Speaking exclusively to MailOnline at the Elbrook Cash and Carry Charity Gala Dinner at Surrey's CHAK 89 on Thursday, the star branded her 'beautiful' love interest a 'gentleman' and jokingly declared she no longer needs dating apps to pursue relationships.

On their glitzy first date, TV personality Chloe enthused: 'We had a really nice date. It was a perfect date. He was a gentleman and we are going to be seeing each other again in a few weeks. He was beautiful in person. We've been speaking for a while.

'If you met him, you’d be like, "Wow".'

The reality star went on to reveal she's looking forward to their second date in a few weeks, when she wraps up filming the latest edition of The Only Way Is Essex.
